[scenario]
clients=client10026;client10027
import=data.txt
actions=header

[client10026]
port=10026
arguments=--action;temporary-failure;--header=From,kou+sender@example.com

[client10027]
port=10027

[header]
command=header

name=From
value=kou+sender@example.com

response=header
n_received=1
status=temporary-failure

headers=From;kou+sender@example.com;;;
